hero.title: Welcome to Mihai Eminescu Romanian School Wellingborough
hero.subtitle: Keeping Romanian culture and language alive for our children
hero.description: Romanian language education for children in Northamptonshire

about.title: About Our School
about.content: Mihai Eminescu Romanian School in Wellingborough is dedicated to preserving and promoting Romanian language, culture, and traditions for children in the Romanian community of Northamptonshire. We provide quality education in a friendly and inclusive environment.

language.title: Romanian Language
language.desc: Structured Romanian language lessons for all ages

culture.title: Culture & Traditions
culture.desc: We celebrate and learn about Romanian traditions

community.title: Community
community.desc: A safe space for Romanian children in Northamptonshire

cta.title: Enroll Your Child Today!
cta.subtitle: Join our community and give your child the opportunity to learn Romanian language and culture.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.content1: Mihai Eminescu Romanian School in Wellingborough is dedicated to preserving and promoting Romanian language, culture, and traditions for children in the Romanian community of Northamptonshire.
mission.content2: Our mission is to provide quality education in Romanian language, in a friendly and inclusive environment where children can learn and grow together. We believe that maintaining connection with cultural roots is essential for the development of our children's identity.

curriculum.title: Curriculum & Schedule
curriculum.age: 5-10 years (initially, will expand in the future)

teacher.title: Our Teacher
teacher.name: Laura Nan
teacher.bio1: Laura Nan is the founder and teacher of Mihai Eminescu Romanian School. With extensive teaching experience gained in Romania, where she taught for many years, Laura dedicates her time and energy to providing Romanian children in the UK with authentic education in Romanian language and culture.
teacher.bio2: For the past two years, Laura has been teaching at a Romanian school in Northampton, where she strengthened her passion for maintaining the cultural identity of children in the diaspora. Her vision is to create a safe and inspiring space where every child can discover the beauty of the Romanian language and stay connected to their roots.
teacher.bio3: Laura brings not only solid pedagogical knowledge but also a deep love for the Romanian community in the United Kingdom.
